text: Jonathan Ray Banks (born January 31, 1947) is an American actor. His known movie roles were in the movies Airplane!, 48 Hrs., and Beverly Hills Cop. He later became well known and won many awards for his role as private Finger in the television series Breaking Bad and its spin-off, Better Call Saul, as well as Frank McPike in Wiseguy. Banks played the voice of James Gordon in the 2015 video game Batman: Arkham Knight. In 2012, Banks won a Saturn Award for Best Supporting Actor on Television. Banks was born in Washington, D.C.. He was raised in Terre Haute, Indiana. He studied at the University of Indiana Bloomington. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Saturn Award winners Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:American video game actors Category:Actors from Washington, D.C. title: Jonathan Banks
